cjlucas.co

Portfolio

rtorrent-python

A simple programatic Python interface to the RTorrent torrent client.

ruby-alfredlite

A lightwight framework for creating Alfred workflows in Ruby. Designed for extensibility and speed.

tower-alfred-workflow

An Alfred workflow that provides simple access to git repositories in Tower. People seem to like it.

ruby-easytag

An abstract interface for the TagLib audio tagging library. Written in Ruby. It was designed to unify TagLibâ€™s fragmented interfaces.

CJAudioPlayer

An audio player for iOS and OS X. It handles playlist management as well as automatically caching HTTP data sources. Written in Objective-C.

Boombox

An audio player for Android. It includes an API for custom data providers which allows the a ability to provide data from sources beyond just HTTP and local access.

Kanihi

An end-to-end solution for streaming your music library from anywhere. It includes a server component, using Ruby on Rails. Clients are available for iOS and Android. This project is a work in progress.

TheTVDB Feeder

A Ruby on Rails web service that turns a list of your favorite tv shows into iCal and RSS feeds. Hosted and managed on Heroku.

A Yet-to-be-named Webvideo Podcaster Service

A Node.js service utilizing the Sails framework designed to turn your favorite YouTube channels into RSS feeds suitible for your favorite podcast client. Currently a work in progress.

ruby-net-nntpclient

An NNTP client library written in Ruby.

Yet Another YEnc Encoder

A 100% pure Ruby YEnc encoder/decoder solution.
